thread.title: Conor MacCormack: The 3D Printing Revolution will be in the classroom
thread.title_full: Conor MacCormack: The 3D Printing Revolution will be in the classroom

title: Conor MacCormack: The 3D Printing Revolution will be in the classroom
text:
Expand Conor MacCormack at TCT Show + Personalize 2015 Irish-based 3D printer manufacturer Mcor Technologies' CEO Dr Conor MacCormack keynoted on the second day at TCT Show + Personalize 2015 . His talk was on his theories of how he thinks true change will come in the classroom rather than the classroom floor. 
To keep up-to-date on all the latest videos from TCT Show make sure you subscribe to our YouTube channel . Tags
